record.description: A view of the University taken from the chimney of the old Power House, looking toward the southeast. The roof of the Press Building is in the immediate foreground; Cobb Hall, with Haskell Hall behind it, and a group of the older dormitories are to the right. The white building is the Law School and Walker Museum and the women's dormitories are at the extreme left.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Stamps: Please return to the University of Chicago Public Relations Office; University Archives Record Copy. Copy has University of Chicago Archives stamp.
